## {{< fa cog >}}  Data Engineering

<br> Turn messy sources into dependable, model‑ready data.

Overview: We implement ingestion, transformation and storage that make data trustworthy and accessible for analytics and ML.

We can help you with:

-   {{< fa angle-double-right >}} **Data harvesting & ingestion** — Stable connectors, scheduling and change capture.
